attributes.action: Implement the FULL 2.55% pay increase to police officers backdated to September 1st
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: police officers accept that we have no industrial action rights owing to our special occupation within society.We call upon the Primeminister to reflect such is our status by reversing the home secretary's decision to implement the pay award from December 1st, effectively cutting police pay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
